species.name: jellicent
descriptions: Fishermen are terrified of Jellicent. It’s rumored to drag them into the sea and steal their lives away.
Its body is mostly seawater. It’s said there’s a castle of ships Jellicent have sunk on the seafloor.
Jellicent is always hanging around fancy cruise ships and tankers, hoping to drag away its prey.
Most of this Pokémon’s body composition is identical to sea water. It makes sunken ships its lair.
The fate of the ships and crew that wander into Jellicent’s habitat: all sunken, all lost, all vanished.

abilities.name: water-absorb
abilities.effect: Absorbs water moves, healing for 1/4 max HP.

abilities.name: cursed-body
abilities.effect: Has a 30% chance of Disabling any move that hits the Pokémon.

abilities.name: damp
abilities.effect: Prevents self destruct, explosion, and aftermath from working while the Pokémon is in battle.
